title: Can RIOT refund my LP ?
body:
I just finished a rank game. My rank is Challenger and i have to play with a Plat 5. The game went horrible after i gank his lane for a first blood. So he can able manage his lane. However after 10', his score ( plat 5 player ) is 0/4 already. The game went over after their top laner killed both of us.

MMR both team
http://i.imgur.com/k7TRNjT.jpg
16' Plat 5 Jax lose 0/5/1 and 100 cs against his opponent.
http://i.imgur.com/7deoduB.png
End game
http://i.imgur.com/U3CljUK.jpg

RITO PLEASE REFUND MY LP. THE MATCHMAKING IS BROKEN.
